title: Textile, "Cadenza", 1986
medium: Technique: screen printed on plain weave foundation.
inscribed: along each side, " CADENZA By SUE PALMER Copyright (symbol) MCMLXXXVI By Warner & Sons Limited (arrow) Top"
dimensions:
A. Warp: 312.5cm (123 1/4in.). Weft: 143cm (56 1/4in.). B. Warp: 76cm (30in.). Weft: 71cm (28in.). C. Warp: 67cm (26 1/4in.). Weft: 71 (28in.). D. Warp: 69cm (27 1/4in.) Weft: 72cm (28 1/4in.). E. Warp: 69cm (27 1/4in.). Weft: 71cm (28in.). F; Warp: 69.5cm (27 3/8in.). Weft: 70.5cm (27 3/4in.). G. Warp: 71.5 928 1/4). Weft: 70.5cm (27 3/4in.).
Pattern: Height of repeat: 63cm (24 3/4in.).
description: Vertical and horizontal geometric shapes behind wavy lines. A. 2 greys and pink. B. 3 beiges. C. same as A. D. 3 blues. E. 3 greens. F. 3 buffs. G. Red and 2 pinks.

Textile, "Cadenza", 1986.
1986. Technique: screen printed on plain weave foundation.. Gift of Warner Fabrics, plc. 1991-103-7-a/g.
